alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Morgan; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:26PM EST until February 22 at 1:55PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River, White River, Tippecanoe River, Wildcat Creek, Eel River, East Fork White River, Flatrock River, and Mississinewa River. .Snow melt and rainfall from Wednesday night through today of around an inch and a half to over two and a half inches on frozen or saturated ground is bringing widespread flooding to central Indiana rivers. Moderate to major flooding is expected on the Mississinewa at Ridgeville. Moderate flooding is expected along upper parts of the Wabash from Lafayette through Covington as well as Wildcat Creek, while lowland and minor flooding is currently forecast for other area rivers. Another system early next week could lengthen the amount of time in flood and produce additional rises on area rivers. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this evening or Friday morning. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Centerton. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.3 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural lands. Blue Bluff and Paragon Roads are impassable. Flood waters affect a few homes in Waverly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 15.6 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
